title: Authentic Wheat for Your Bread - SOLD
author: frankbmd

posts.post_title: Authentic Wheat for Your Bread - SOLD
posts.post_content:
For $90 (bread) shipped I will send you Wheat shown below.

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/31529/wheat-2-hof[/IMG]

This card was recently submitted for grading.  Why it did not receive a numerical grade is a complete mystery to me and others who have seen it.  I was expecting a decent grade and re-submission of this card I feel is a viable option.  Or if you are an ungraded collector this card this would be a handsome HOFer for your collection.  it is a beautifully centered card with great color.

And it's gone.
